channel.title: RS317 Lite [Client]
channel.description:
Note: This is a Client not a Server.
[QUOTE=Sadistic;2704306]This is a client I've been cleaning and refactoring to my semi-perfectionist standards. I'm not going to go into detail because I really don't care who uses it. All unrefactored methods have been changed to the format [CODE]method#(arg#, arg# ...)[/CODE] All but two classes (relating to sounds) have had a name change. A lot of bad naming has been fixed. There are still places that can be cleaned to make it "perfect", but again this is just a client base. There is no content other than swat's new model header (which is easy to remove if you don't want it). List of class names [CODE]AnimatedObject.java Animation.java Applet.java Archive.java Bzip2Block.java Bzip2Decompressor.java Cache.java CacheableNode.java CacheFile.java Censor.java Class29.java Class39.java Client.java CollisionMap.java CullingCluster.java Deque.java Entity.java FileRequester.java Floor.java Font.java Frame.java Graphics2D.java GraphicsBuffer.java GroundDecoration.java GroundItem.java GroundTile.java HashTable.java IdentityKit.java IndexedSprite.java InteractiveObject.java Interface.java IsaacCipher.java ItemDefinition.java ItemPile.java MapUtil.java Mobile.java Model.java ModelHeader.java MouseRecorder.java Node.java Npc.java NpcDefinition.java ObjectDefinition.java OnDemandFetcher.java OnDemandRequest.java PacketSizes.java Player.java PlayerInput.java Projectile.java Queue.java Rasterizer.java Region.java SceneGraph.java SceneObject.java Sequence.java ShapedTile.java Signlink.java Skills.java SkinList.java Socket.java Sound.java Soundtrack.java SpotAnimation.java Sprite.java StillGraphic.java Stream.java TextUtil.java Tile.java VarBit.java Varp.java VertexNormal.java WallDecoration.java WallObject.java[/CODE] Media: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C3jzZ.png[/img] [/QUOTE] Download: [url=http://uppit.com/gaydar8bfm3fi/RS317_Lite.rar]http://uppit.com/gaydar8bfm3fi/RS317_Lite.rar[/url]
100% Credits to Sadistic from Google.

item.description:
@DragonX_Pkz wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]He used a picture of iClarity; which is Primadude’s server.

For one; don’t post other peoples’ work just to get rep, or whatever you’re aiming at.
Secondly; don’t post other peoples’ work, which are posting work of other people.[/quote]Yes ik he used iClarity, but this is a client not a source. Also idc about rep, if they want to rep- me because I posted someone elses work because I didn’t see it here and thought we could use it then they can go ahead. All im doing is trying to help.

item.title: RS317 Lite [Client]
item.dc:creator: @DragonX_Pkz DragonX Pkz
item.description:
@DragonX_Pkz wrote:

Note: This is a Client not a Server.

[QUOTE=Sadistic;2704306]This is a client I’ve been cleaning and refactoring to my semi-perfectionist standards.
I’m not going to go into detail because I really don’t care who uses it.
All unrefactored methods have been changed to the format

method#(arg#, arg# ...)

All but two classes (relating to sounds) have had a name change.
A lot of bad naming has been fixed.
There are still places that can be cleaned to make it “perfect”, but again this is just a client base.
There is no content other than swat’s new model header (which is easy to remove if you don’t want it).
List of class names

AnimatedObject.java Animation.java Applet.java Archive.java Bzip2Block.java Bzip2Decompressor.java Cache.java CacheableNode.java CacheFile.java Censor.java Class29.java Class39.java Client.java CollisionMap.java CullingCluster.java Deque.java Entity.java FileRequester.java Floor.java Font.java Frame.java Graphics2D.java GraphicsBuffer.java GroundDecoration.java GroundItem.java GroundTile.java HashTable.java IdentityKit.java IndexedSprite.java InteractiveObject.java Interface.java IsaacCipher.java ItemDefinition.java ItemPile.java MapUtil.java Mobile.java Model.java ModelHeader.java MouseRecorder.java Node.java Npc.java NpcDefinition.java ObjectDefinition.java OnDemandFetcher.java OnDemandRequest.java PacketSizes.java Player.java PlayerInput.java Projectile.java Queue.java Rasterizer.java Region.java SceneGraph.java SceneObject.java Sequence.java ShapedTile.java Signlink.java Skills.java SkinList.java Socket.java Sound.java Soundtrack.java SpotAnimation.java Sprite.java StillGraphic.java Stream.java TextUtil.java Tile.java VarBit.java Varp.java VertexNormal.java WallDecoration.java WallObject.java
